body_html:
@ngimel hello, I met the same error on tx2, complied pytorch 0.3.0.. But the error is this: 'cuda runtime error(7): too many resources requested for launch at ...../pytorch/torch/lib/THCUNN/generic/SpatialDilatedMaxPooling.cu'. The file is different with 'VolumetricUpSamplingTrilinear.cu', is that I need add this line 'launch_bounds(1024)' to every function in file 'SpatialDilatedMaxPooling.cu'?
Thank you!

@ngimel hello, I met the same error on tx2, complied pytorch 0.3.0.. But the error is this: 'cuda runtime error(7): too many resources requested for launch at ...../pytorch/torch/lib/THCUNN/generic/SpatialDilatedMaxPooling.cu'. The file is different with 'VolumetricUpSamplingTrilinear.cu', is that I need add  this line 'launch_bounds(1024)' to every function in file 'SpatialDilatedMaxPooling.cu'?
Thank you!
body:
@ngimel hello, I met the same error on tx2, complied pytorch 0.3.0.. But the error is this: 'cuda runtime error(7): too many resources requested for launch at ...../pytorch/torch/lib/THCUNN/generic/SpatialDilatedMaxPooling.cu'. The file is different with 'VolumetricUpSamplingTrilinear.cu', is that I need add  this line '__launch_bounds__(1024)' to every function in file 'SpatialDilatedMaxPooling.cu'?
Thank you!
